intro: Acilepis aspera, commonly known as the rough acilepis, is a species of flowering plant native to certain regions of southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Due to its unique appearance and ecological role, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
